svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Life expectancy at birth, including the UN projections
Shown is the observed life expectancy at birth for both sexes since 1950 and the Medium Variant projections by the
